GSD.product_version: versions from v3.12 to before v5.15.86
GSD.description:
iommu/fsl_pamu: Fix resource leak in fsl_pamu_probe()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.86 by commit e42b543d08052c3b223bcfb48f05cbaf0b767f86, it was introduced in version v3.12 by commit 695093e38c3ef63fcb43a2840ed865efa20671d5. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: iommu/fsl_pamu: Fix resource leak in fsl_pamu_probe()
